name: vue-state
description: Unified Vue component and application state

scripts.build: coffee -b -c index.coffee && rollup -e vue -f cjs index.js > index.cjs && mv index.cjs index.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json yarn.lock yarn-error.log index.js

author: Steve Shreeve <steve.shreeve@gmail.com>
